alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 9:46PM CDT until April 17 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Snake River below Warren affecting Marshall County. Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snake River below Warren. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 67.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 66.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 68.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 67.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
